tool.name: BackupKGAsJSON

param.name: Knowledge_Graph_to_Export_to_JSON
param.displayname: Knowledge Graph to Export to JSON
param.dialogReference: Select the knowledge graph to create JSON backup files for. You must be signed into your Enterprise portal.
param.pythonReference: Select the knowledge graph to create JSON backup files for. You must be signed into your Enterprise portal.

param.name: Folder_Knowledge_Graph_Backups
param.dialogReference: This is the root location of where you will store the folders of JSON files. Consider using the same folder for all backups you create, since there will be sub directories created within the folder you provide here.
param.pythonReference: This is the root location of where you will store the folders of JSON files. Consider using the same folder for all backups you create, since there will be sub directories created within the folder you provide here.

param.name: Exercise_number
param.dialogReference: You may choose to specify which exercise these JSON backup files represent for organization.
param.pythonReference: You may choose to specify which exercise these JSON backup files represent for organization.

tool.summary:
This code was taken and then adapted from this site: https://developers.arcgis.com/python/samples/create-and-load-knowledge-graph-backups/.

This tool downloads a knowledge graph as a series of JSON files. These JSON files have hard coded names. To assist with organizing multiple "downloaded" knowledge graphs, the user can provide an exercise number, which will be the starting character for the folder containing the JSON files. Otherwise, these JSON files will be in a subdirectory named after the input Knowledge graph.
tool.usage: Created by Timothy Kinlaw in Esri Training Services.
